title: Hundreds of National Guard forces deployed to L.A. by Trump could be sent to wildfire duty
description: A controversial federal National Guard deployment to Los Angeles could lose some troops to wildfire duty.
content: A military commander has discussed shifting some California National Guard troops away from the Trump administration's weekslong deployment to deal with protests in Los Angeles so they can help fight… [+3411 chars]

title: Military to Hegseth: Let Troops Leave LA Protests to Fight Fires
description: The top military commander in charge of troops deployed to Los Angeles to respond to protests against immigration raids has asked Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth if 200 of those forces could be returned to wildfire fighting duty, two US officials told the AP o…

title: The Fire of Freedom

title: Wildfire near Lytton, B.C., prompts evacuation order, local state of emergency
description: The Thompson-Nicola Regional District has declared a local state of emergency for the Blue Sky Country region due to an encroaching out-of-control wildfire near Lytton, B.C.
content:

title: How Much Does a Heat Wave Cost? Insurers and CEOs Want to Know
